actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Organic Act of Guam to provide that the Secretary of the Interior shall supervise the activities of the comptroller general for Guam through the Inspector General of the Department of Interior.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to appoint a government comptroller for Guam who shall be under the general supervision of the Secretary through the Inspector General of the Department of the Interior.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Organic Act of Guam to provide that the Secretary of the Interior shall supervise the activities of the comptroller general for Guam through the Inspector General of the Department of Interior.
